content.name: real_bounded
content.prop: real_bounded s = ?B. !x. member x s --> abs x <= B

content.name: real_bounded_pos_lt
content.prop: real_bounded s = ?b. 0 < b & !x. member x s --> abs x < b

content.name: real_bounded_subset
content.prop: real_bounded t & subset t s --> real_bounded s

content.name: real_bounded_union
content.prop: real_bounded (union s t) = real_bounded s & real_bounded t

content.name: real_bounded_subset_open_interval_symetric
content.prop: real_bounded s --> ?a. subset s (real_open_interval (-a) a)

content.name: real_bounded_subset_open_interval
content.prop: real_bounded s --> ?a. ?b. subset s (real_open_interval a b)

content.name: real_bounded_subset_closed_interval_symetric
content.prop: real_bounded s --> ?a. subset s (real_closed_interval (-a) a)

content.name: real_bounded_subset_closed_interval
content.prop: real_bounded s --> ?a. ?b. subset s (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: tendsto_real
content.prop: tendsto_real f l net = !e. 0 < e --> eventualy (%x. abs (f x - l) < e) net

content.name: reallim
content.prop: reallim net f = THE l. tendsto_real f l net

content.name: trivial_limit
content.prop: trivial_limit net = eventualy (%x::'a. false) net

content.name: reallim_trivial
content.prop: trivial_limit net --> tendsto_real f l net

content.name: reallim_unique
content.prop: neg (trivial_limit net) & tendsto_real f l1 net & tendsto_real f l2 net --> l1 = l2

content.name: reallim_const
content.prop: tendsto_real (%x. a) a net

content.name: reallim_lmul
content.prop: tendsto_real f l net --> tendsto_real (%x. c * f x) (c * l) net

content.name: reallim_rmul
content.prop: tendsto_real f l net --> tendsto_real (%x. (f x) * c) (l * c) net

content.name: reallim_lmul_eq
content.prop: neg (c = 0) --> tendsto_real (%x. c * f x) (c * l) net = tendsto_real f l net

content.name: reallim_rmul_eq
content.prop: neg (c = 0) --> tendsto_real (%x. (f x) * c) (l * c) net = tendsto_real f l net

content.name: reallim_neg_eq
content.prop: tendsto_real (%x. -(f x)) (-l) net = tendsto_real f l net

content.name: reallim_add
content.prop: tendsto_real f l net & tendsto_real g m net --> tendsto_real (%x. f x + g x) (l + m) net

content.name: reallim_sub
content.prop: tendsto_real f l net & tendsto_real g m net --> tendsto_real (%x. f x - g x) (l - m) net

content.name: reallim_mul
content.prop: tendsto_real f l net & tendsto_real g m net --> tendsto_real (%x. f x * g x) (l * m) net

content.name: reallim_inverse
content.prop: tendsto_real f l net & neg (l = 0) --> tendsto_real (%x. real_inverse (f x)) (real_inverse l) net

content.name: reallim_div
prop: tendsto_real f l net & tendsto_real g m net & neg (m = 0)

content.name: reallim_abs
content.prop: tendsto_real f l net --> tendsto_real (%x. abs (f x)) (abs l) net

content.name: reallim_pow
content.prop: tendsto_real f l net --> tendsto_real (%x. (f x) ^ n) (l ^ n) net

content.name: reallim_max
prop: tendsto_real f l net & tendsto_real g m net
--> tendsto_real (%x. max (f x) (g x)) (max l m) net

content.name: reallim_min
prop: tendsto_real f l net & tendsto_real g m net
--> tendsto_real (%x. min (f x) (g x)) (min l m) net

content.name: reallim_null
content.prop: tendsto_real f l net --> tendsto_real (%x. (f x) - l) 0 net

content.name: reallim_null_add
prop: tendsto_real f 0 net & tendsto_real g 0 net

content.name: reallim_null_lmul
content.prop: tendsto_real f 0 net --> tendsto_real (%x. c * f x) 0 net

content.name: reallim_null_rmul
content.prop: tendsto_real f 0 net --> tendsto_real (%x. (f x) * c) 0 net

content.name: reallim_null_pow
content.prop: tendsto_real f 0 net & neg (n = 0) --> tendsto_real (%x. (f x) ^ n) 0 net

content.name: reallim_null_lmul_eq
content.prop: neg (c = 0) --> tendsto_real (%x. c * f x) 0 net = tendsto_real f 0 net

content.name: reallim_null_rmul_eq
content.prop: neg (c = 0) --> tendsto_real (%x. f x * c) 0 net = tendsto_real f 0 net

content.name: reallim_null_neg
content.prop: tendsto_real (%x. -(f x)) 0 net = tendsto_real f 0 net

content.name: reallim_null_sub
prop: tendsto_real f 0 net & tendsto_real g 0 net

content.name: reallim_transform_eventually
prop: eventually (%x. f x = g x) net & tendsto_real f l net

content.name: reallim_transform
prop: tendsto_real (%x. f x - g x) 0 net & tendsto_real f l net

content.name: reallim_transform_eq
prop: tendsto_real (%x. f x - g x) 0 net
--> tendsto_real f l net = tendsto_real g l net

content.name: reallim_transform_straddle
prop: eventually (%n. f n <= g n) net & tendsto_real f a net &
eventually (%n. g n <= h n) net & tendsto_real h a net

content.name: reallim_null_abs
content.prop: tendsto_real (%x. abs (f x)) 0 net = tendsto_real f 0 net

content.name: reallim_within_le
prop: !x. member x s & 0 < abs (x - a) & abs (x - a) <= d

content.name: reallim_within
prop: !x. member x s & 0 < abs (x - a) & abs (x - a) < d

content.name: reallim_at
prop: --> ?d. 0 < d & !x. 0 < abs (x - a) & abs (x - a) < d

content.name: reallim_at_infinity
prop: !e. 0 < e --> ?b. !x. abs x >= b --> abs (f x - l) < e

content.name: reallim_eventually
content.prop: eventually (%x. f x = l) net --> tendsto_real f l net

content.name: reallim_le
prop: tendsto_real f l net & tendsto_real g m net &
eventually (%x. f x <= g x) net

content.name: reallim_const_eq
content.prop: tendsto_real (%x. c) d net = trivial_limit net | c = d

content.name: reallim_sum
prop: finite s & (!i. member i s --> tendsto_real (f i) (l i) net)
--> tendsto_real (%x. sum s (%i. f i x)) (sum s l) net

content.name: reallim_null_sum
prop: finite s & (!a. member a s --> tendsto_real (%x. f x a) 0 net)

content.name: reallim_null_comparison
prop: eventually (%x. abs (f x) <= g x) net & tendsto_real g 0 net

content.name: convergent_real_bounded_monotone
prop: ((!n. s n <= s (Suc n)) | (!n. s (Suc n) <= s n))

content.name: reallim_eventually_ubound
content.prop: tendsto_real f l net & l < c --> eventually (%x. f x < c) net

content.name: reallim_eventually_lbound
content.prop: tendsto_real f l net & c < l --> eventually (%x. c < f x) net

content.name: reallim_sequentially_within
content.prop: tendsto_real f l sequentially --> tendsto_real f l (within sequentially s)

content.name: real_sums
content.prop: real_sums f l s = tendsto_real (%n. sum (inter s {0..n}) f) l sequentially

content.name: real_infsum
content.prop: real_infsum s f = THE l. real_sums f l s

content.name: real_summable
content.prop: real_summable s f = ?l. real_sums f l s

content.name: real_series_cauchy
prop: --> ?N. !m. !n. m >= N --> abs (sum (inter s {m..n}) f) < e

content.name: real_summable_cauchy
prop: --> ?N. !m. !n. m >= N --> abs (sum (inter s {m..n}) f) < e

content.name: real_sums_summable
content.prop: real_sums f l s --> real_summable s f

content.name: real_sums_infsum
content.prop: real_sums f (real_infsum s f) s = real_summable s f

content.name: from
content.prop: from n = {m. n <= m}

content.name: real_series_from
content.prop: real_sums f l (from k) = tendsto_real (%n. sum {k..n} f) l sequentially

content.name: real_series_unique
content.prop: real_sums f l1 s & real_sums f l2 s --> l1 = l2

content.name: real_infsum_unique
content.prop: real_sums f l s --> real_infsum s f = l

content.name: real_series_finite
content.prop: finite s --> real_sums f (sum s f) s

content.name: real_summable_finite
content.prop: finite s --> real_summable s f

content.name: real_summable_iff_eventually
prop: (?N. !n. N <= n & member n s --> f n = g n)
--> real_summable s f = real_summable s g

content.name: real_summable_eq_eventually
prop: (?N. !n. N <= n & member n s --> f n = g n) & real_summable s f

content.name: real_summable_iff_cofinite
prop: --> real_summable s f = real_summable t f

content.name: real_summable_eq_cofinite
prop: finite (union (diff s t) (diff t s)) & real_summable s f

content.name: real_summable_from_elsewhere
content.prop: real_summable (from m) f --> real_summable (from n) f

content.name: real_summable_from_elsewhere_eq
content.prop: real_summable (from m) f = real_summable (from n) f

content.name: real_series_goestozero
prop: --> eventually (%n. member n s --> abs (f n) < e) sequentially

content.name: real_summable_imp_tozero
prop: --> tendsto_real (%n. if member n s then f n else 0) 0 sequentially

content.name: real_summable_imp__bounded
content.prop: real_summable s f --> real_bounded (image f s)

content.name: real_summable_imp_real_sums_bounded
content.prop: real_summable (from k) f --> real_bounded {y. !n. y = sum {k..n} f}

content.name: real_series_0
content.prop: real_sums (%n. 0) 0 s

content.name: real_series_add
prop: real_sums x x0 s & real_sums y y0 s
--> real_sums (%n. x n + y n) (x0 + y0) s

content.name: real_series_sub
prop: real_sums x x0 s & real_sums y y0 s
--> real_sums (%n. x n - y n) (x0 - y0) s

content.name: real_series_lmul
content.prop: real_sums x x0 s --> real_sums (%n. c * x n) (c * x0) s

content.name: real_series_rmul
content.prop: real_sums x x0 s --> real_sums (%n. x n * c) (x0 * c) s

content.name: real_series_neg
content.prop: real_sums x x0 s --> real_sums (%n. -(x n)) (-x0) s

content.name: real_sums_iff
prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = g x)
--> real_sums f l s = real_sums g l s

content.name: real_sums_eq
prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = g x) & real_sums f l s

content.name: real_series_finite_support
prop: finite (inter s t) & (!x. neg (member x (inter s t)) --> f x = 0)
--> real_sums f (sum (inter s t) f) t

content.name: real_series_diffs
prop: --> real_sums (%n. f n - f (n + 1)) (f k) (from k)

content.name: real_series_trival
content.prop: real_sums f 0 empty_set

content.name: real_series_restrict
prop: real_sums (%n. if member n s then f n else 0) l univ =

content.name: real_series_sum
prop: finite s & subset s t & (!x. neg (member x s) --> f x = 0) & sum s f = l

content.name: real_series_even
prop: real_sums (%i. if even i then f (i DIV 2) else 0) l (from (2 * n))

content.name: real_series_odd
prop: real_sums (%i. if odd i then f (i DIV 2) else 0) l (from (2 * n + 1))

content.name: real_partial_sums_le_infsum
prop: (!i. member i s --> 0 <= f i) & real_summable s f
--> sum (inter s {0..n}) f <= real_infsum s f

content.name: real_partial_sums_le_infsum_gen
prop: (!i. member i s --> 0 <= f i) & real_summable s f
--> sum t f <= real_infsum s f

content.name: real_series_terms_tozero
content.prop: real_sums f l (from n) --> tendsto_real f 0 sequentially

content.name: real_series_le
prop: real_sums f y s & real_sums g z s &
(!i. member i s --> f i <= g i)

content.name: real_series_pos
prop: real_sums f y s & (!i. member i s --> 0 <= f i)

content.name: real_series_bound
prop: real_sums f y s & real_sums g z s &
(!i. member i s --> abs (f i) <= g i)

content.name: real_series_comparison_bound
prop: real_sums g z s & (!i. member i s --> abs (f i) <= g i)
--> ?y. real_sums f y s & abs y <= z

content.name: real_series_mul
prop: real_sums x a (from 0) & real_sums y b (from 0) &
--> real_sums (%n. sum {0..n} (%i. x i * y (n - i))) (a * b) (from 0)

content.name: real_series_mul_unique
prop: real_sums x a (from 0) & real_sums y b (from 0) &
real_sums (%n. sum {0..n} (%i. x i * y (n - i))) c (from 0)

content.name: real_summable_0
content.prop: real_summable s (%n. 0)

content.name: real_summable_add
prop: real_summable s x & real_summable s y
--> real_summable s (%n. x n + y n)

content.name: real_summable_sub
prop: real_summable s x & real_summable s y
--> real_summable s (%n. x n - y n)

content.name: real_summable_lmul
content.prop: real_summable s x --> real_summable s (%n. c * x n)

content.name: real_summable_rmul
content.prop: real_summable s x --> real_summable s (%n. x n * c)

content.name: real_summable_neg
content.prop: real_summable s x --> real_summable s (%n. -(x n))

content.name: real_summable_iff
prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = g x)
--> real_summable s f = real_summable s g

content.name: real_summable_eq
prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = g x) & real_summable s f

content.name: real_series_subset
prop: real_sums (%i. if member i s then f i else 0) l t

content.name: real_summable_subset
prop: real_summable t (%i. if member i s then f i else 0)

content.name: real_summable_trivial
content.prop: real_summable empty_set f

content.name: real_summable_restrict
prop: real_summable univ (%i. if member i s then f i else 0) =

content.name: real_sums_finite_diff
prop: subset t s & finite t & real_sums f l s
--> real_sums f (l - sum t f) (diff s t)

content.name: real_sums_finite_union
prop: finite t & real_sums f l s
--> real_sums f (l + sum (diff t s) f) (union s t)

content.name: real_sums_offset
prop: real_sums f l (from m) & m < n

content.name: real_sums_offset_rev
prop: real_sums f l (from m) & n < m

content.name: real_summable_even
prop: real_summable (from (2 * n)) (%i. if even i then f (i DIV 2) else 0)

content.name: real_summable_odd
prop: real_summable (from (2 * n + 1)) (%i. if odd i then f (i DIV 2) else 0)

content.name: real_infsum_0
content.prop: real_infsum s (%n. 0) = 0

content.name: real_infsum_add
prop: real_summable s x & real_summable s y
--> real_infsum s (%n. x n + y n) =
real_infsum s x + real_infsum s y

content.name: real_infsum_sub
prop: real_summable s x & real_summable s y
--> real_infsum s (%n. x n - y n) =
real_infsum s x - real_infsum s y

content.name: real_infsum_lmul
content.prop: real_summable s x --> real_infsum s (%n. c * x n) = c * real_infsum s x

content.name: real_infsum_rmul
content.prop: real_summable s x --> real_infsum s (%n. x n * c) = real_infsum s x * c

content.name: real_infsum_neg
content.prop: real_summable s x --> real_infsum s (%n. -(x n)) = -(real_infsum s x)

content.name: real_infsum_eq
prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = g x) & real_summable s f & real_summable s g
--> real_infsum s f = real_infsum s g

content.name: real_infsum_restrict
prop: real_infsum univ (%i. if member i s then f i else 0) =

content.name: real_infsum_even
prop: real_infsum (from (2 * n)) (%i. if even i then f (i DIV 2) else 0)

content.name: real_infsum_odd
prop: real_infsum (from (2 * n + 1)) (%i. if odd i then f (i DIV 2) else 0)

content.name: rea_series_cauchy_uniform
prop: --> abs (sum (inter s {0..n}) (f x) - l x) < e) =

content.name: real_series_comparison
prop: (?N. !i. i >= N & member i s --> abs (f i) <= g i)

content.name: real_summable_comparison
prop: (?N. !i. i >= N & member i s --> abs (f i) <= g i)

content.name: real_series_comparison_uniform
prop: (?N. !i. !x. N <= i & member i s & P x --> abs (f x i) <= g i)
--> abs (sum (inter s {0..i}) (f x) - l x) < e

content.name: real_summable_pos_subset
prop: (!x. member x t --> 0 <= f x) & real_summable t f & subset s t

content.name: real_series_ratio
prop: (!i. i >= N --> abs (f (Suc i)) <=  c * abs (f i))

content.name: real_series_dirichlet
prop: (!i. N <= i --> g (Suc i) <=  g i) &
--> real_summable (from k) (%n. g n * f n)

content.name: real_series_absconv_imp_conv
content.prop: real_summable s (%n. abs (f n)) --> real_summable s f

content.name: real_sums_gp
content.prop: abs x < 1 --> real_sums (%k. x ^ k) (x ^ n / (1 - x)) (from n)

content.name: real_summable_gp
content.prop: abs x < 1 --> real_summable s (%k. x ^ k)

content.name: real_summable_zeta_integer
content.prop: 2 <= m --> real_summable (from n) (%k. real_inverse ((of_nat k) ^ m))

content.name: real_abel_lemma
prop: (!n. member n s --> abs (a n) * r0 ^ n <= M)
--> real_summable s (%k. abs (a k) * r ^ k)

content.name: real_power_series_conv_imp_absconv
prop: real_summable s (%k. abs (a k) * z ^ k ) & abs w <= abs z
--> real_summable s (%k. abs ((a k) * w ^ k))

content.name: power_real_series_conv_imp_absconv_weak
prop: real_summable s (%k. abs (a k) * z ^ k ) & abs w <= abs z
--> real_summable s (%k. abs (a k) * w ^ k)

content.name: real_summable_mul_left
prop: --> real_summable (from p) (%k. (sum {0..k} (%i. x i * y (k - i))))

content.name: real_summable_mul_right
prop: --> real_summable (from p) (%k. (sum {0..k} (%i. x i * y (k - i))))

content.name: withinreal_univ
content.prop: within (atreal x) univ = atreal x

content.name: eventually_atreal
prop: ?d. 0 < d & !x. 0 < abs (x - a) & abs (x - a) < d --> p x

content.name: trivial_limit_atreal
content.prop: neg (trivial_limit (atreal a))

content.name: eventually_withinreal
prop: ?d. 0 < d & !x. member x s & 0 < abs (x - a) & abs (x - a) < d --> p x

content.name: eventually_withinreal_le
prop: !x. member x s & 0 < abs (x - a) & abs (x - a) <= d --> p x

content.name: reallim_withinreal_le
prop: !x. member x s & 0 < abs (x - a) & abs (x - a) <= d

content.name: reallim_withinreal
prop: !x. member x s & 0 < abs (x - a) & abs (x - a) < d

content.name: reallim_atreal
prop: !x. member x s & 0 < abs (x - a) & abs (x - a) < d

content.name: reallim_atreal_withinreal
content.prop: tendsto_real f l (atreal a) --> tendsto_real f l (within (atreal a) s)

content.name: reallim_withinreal_subset
prop: tendsto_real f l (within (atreal a) s) & subset t s

content.name: reallim_atreal_id
content.prop: tendsto_real (%x. x) a (atreal a)

content.name: reallim_withinreal_id
content.prop: tendsto_real (%x. x) a (within (atreal a) s)

content.name: reallim_transform_withinreal_set
prop: eventually (%x. member x s = member x t) (atreal a)

content.name: reallim_transform_withinreal_set_imp
prop: eventually (%x. member x s = member x t) (atreal a) &

content.name: reallim_compose_within
prop: eventually (%w. member (f w) s & (f w = y --> g y = z)) net &

content.name: reallim_compose_at
prop: eventually (%w. f w = y --> g y = z) net &

content.name: alternating_sum_bounds
prop: (!n. even n --> 0 <= a n) & (!n. odd n --> a n <= 0)
--> !m. !n. (even m --> 0 <= sum {m..n} a & sum {m..n} a <= a m) &
!m. !n. (odd m --> a m <= sum {m..n} a & sum {m..n} a <= 0)

content.name: alternating_sum_bound
prop: (!n. even n --> 0 <= a n) & (!n. odd n --> a n <= 0)

content.name: real_summable_alternating_series
prop: (!n. even n --> 0 <= a n) & (!n. odd n --> a n <= 0) &

content.name: reallim_within_real_open
prop: --> tendsto_real f l (within (atreal a) s) = tendsto_real f l (atreal a)

content.name: reallim_atreal_zero
content.prop: tendsto_real f l (atreal a) = tendsto_real (%x. f (a + x)) l (atreal 0)

content.name: reallim_cong_withinreal
prop: (!x. neg (x = a) --> f x = g x)
--> tendsto_real f l (within (atreal a) s) = tendsto_real g l (within (atreal a) s)

content.name: reallim_cong_atreal
prop: (!x. neg (x = a) --> f x = g x)
--> tendsto_real f l (atreal a) = tendsto_real g l (atreal a)

content.name: real_abel_limit_theorem
prop: --> (!r. abs r < 1 --> real_summable s (%i. a i * r ^ i)) &
tendsto_real (%r. real_infsum s (%i. a i * r ^ i)) (real_infsum s a)

content.name: real_continuous
content.prop: real_continuous f net = tendsto_real f (f (netlimit net)) net

content.name: real_continuous_trivial_limit
content.prop: trivial_limit net --> real_continuous f net

content.name: real_continuous_withinreal1
prop: (!x1. member x1 s & abs (x1 - x) < d --> abs ( f x1 - f x) < e)

content.name: real_continuous_atreal1
prop: (!x1. abs (x1 - x) < d --> abs ( f x1 - f x) < e)

content.name: real_continuous_withinreal_subset
prop: real_continuous f (within (atreal x) s) & subset t s

content.name: real_continuous_transform_withinreal
prop: (!x1. member x1 s & abs (x1 - x) < d --> f x1 = g x1) &

content.name: real_continuous_const
content.prop: real_continuous (%x. c) net

content.name: real_continuous_lmul
content.prop: real_continuous f net --> real_continuous (%x. c * f x) net

content.name: real_continuous_rmul
content.prop: real_continuous f net --> real_continuous (%x. f x * c) net

content.name: real_continuous_neg
content.prop: real_continuous f net --> real_continuous (%x. -(f x)) net

content.name: real_continuous_add
prop: real_continuous f net & real_continuous g net
--> real_continuous (%x. f x + g x) net

content.name: real_continuous_sub
prop: real_continuous f net & real_continuous g net
--> real_continuous (%x. f x - g x) net

content.name: real_continuous_mul
prop: real_continuous f net & real_continuous g net
--> real_continuous (%x. f x * g x) net

content.name: real_continuous_div
prop: real_continuous f net & real_continuous g net & neg (g (netlimit net) = 0)
--> real_continuous (%x. f x / g x) net

content.name: real_continuous_pow
content.prop: real_continuous f net --> real_continuous (%x. f x ^ n) net

content.name: real_continuous_abs
content.prop: real_continuous f net --> real_continuous (%x. abs (f x)) net

content.name: real_continuous_max
prop: real_continuous f net & real_continuous g net

content.name: real_continuous_min
prop: real_continuous f net & real_continuous g net

content.name: real_continuous_within_id
content.prop: real_continuous (%x. x) (within (atreal x) s)

content.name: real_continuous_at_id
content.prop: real_continuous (%x. x) (atreal x)

content.name: real_continuous_inv_withinreal
prop: real_continuous f (within (atreal a) s) & neg (f a = 0)

content.name: real_continuous_div_withinreal
prop: real_continuous g (within (atreal a) s) & neg (g a = 0)
--> real_continuous (%x. f x / g x) (within (atreal a) s)

content.name: real_continuous_div_atreal
prop: --> real_continuous (%x. f x / g x) (atreal a)

content.name: real_continuous_atreal_compose
prop: real_continuous f (atreal x) & real_continuous g (atreal (f x))

content.name: real_continuous_on
prop: !x1. member x1 s & abs (x1 - x) < d

content.name: real_continuous_on_eq_continuous_within
prop: !x. member x s --> real_continuous f (within (atreal x) s)

content.name: real_continuous_on_subset
content.prop: real_continuous_on f s & subset t s --> real_continuous_on f t

content.name: real_continuous_on_compose
prop: real_continuous_on f s & real_continuous_on g (image f s)

content.name: real_continuous_on_const
content.prop: real_continuous_on (%x. c) s

content.name: real_continuous_on_id
content.prop: real_continuous_on (%x. x) s

content.name: real_continuous_on_lmul
content.prop: real_continuous_on f s --> real_continuous_on (%x. c * f x) s

content.name: real_continuous_on_rmul
content.prop: real_continuous_on f s --> real_continuous_on (%x. f x * c) s

content.name: real_continuous_on_neg
content.prop: real_continuous_on f s --> real_continuous_on (%x. -(f x)) s

content.name: real_continuous_on_add
prop: real_continuous_on f s & real_continuous_on g s
--> real_continuous_on (%x. f x + g x) s

content.name: real_continuous_on_sub
prop: real_continuous_on f s & real_continuous_on g s
--> real_continuous_on (%x. f x - g x) s

content.name: real_continuous_on_mul
prop: real_continuous_on f s & real_continuous_on g s
--> real_continuous_on (%x. f x * g x) s

content.name: real_continuous_on_inv
prop: real_continuous_on f s & (!x. member x s --> neg (f x = 0))

content.name: real_continuous_on_div
prop: --> real_continuous_on (%x. f x / g x) s

content.name: real_continuous_on_pow
content.prop: real_continuous_on f s --> real_continuous_on (%x. f x ^ n) s

content.name: real_continuous_on_abs
content.prop: real_continuous_on f s --> real_continuous_on (%x. abs (f x)) s

content.name: real_continuous_on_max
prop: real_continuous_on f s & real_continuous_on g s

content.name: real_continuous_on_min
prop: real_continuous_on f s & real_continuous_on g s

content.name: real_continuous_on_eq
prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = g x) & real_continuous_on f s

content.name: real_continuous_on_union
prop: real_continuous_on f s & real_continuous_on f t

content.name: real_continuous_on_union_open
prop: real_continuous_on f s & real_continuous_on f t

content.name: real_continuous_on_cases
prop: real_continuous_on f s & real_continuous_on f t &
(!x. member x s & neg (P x) | member x t & P x --> f x = g x)
--> real_continuous_on (%x. if P x then f x else g x) (union s t)

content.name: real_continuous_on_cases_open
prop: real_continuous_on f s & real_continuous_on f t &
(!x. member x s & neg (P x) | member x t & P x --> f x = g x)
--> real_continuous_on (%x. if P x then f x else g x) (union s t)

content.name: real_continuous_sum
prop: finite s & (!a. member a s --> real_continuous (f a) net)
--> real_continuous (%x. sum s (%a. f a x)) net

content.name: real_continuous_product
prop: finite s & (!a. member a s --> real_continuous (f a) net)
--> real_continuous (%x. product s (%a. f a x)) net

content.name: real_continuous_on_sum
prop: finite s & (!a. member a s --> real_continuous_on (f a) t)
--> real_continuous_on (%x. sum s (%a. f a x)) t

content.name: real_continuous_on_product
prop: finite s & (!a. member a s --> real_continuous_on (f a) t)
--> real_continuous_on (%x. product s (%a. f a x)) t

content.name: reallim_real_continuous_function
prop: real_continuous f (atreal l) & tendsto_real g l net

content.name: real_continuous_on_eq_real_continuous_at
prop: !x. member x s --> real_continuous f (atreal x)

content.name: real_continuous_attains_sup
prop: real_compact s & neg (s = empty_set) & real_continuous_on f s
--> ?x. member x s & (!y. member y s --> f y <= f x)

content.name: real_continuous_attains_inf
prop: real_compact s & neg (s = empty_set) & real_continuous_on f s
--> ?x. member x s & (!y. member y s --> f x <= f y)

content.name: real_uniformly_continuous_on
prop: !x. !x1. member x s & member x1 s & abs (x1 - x) < d

content.name: real_uniformly_continuous_imp_real_continuous
content.prop: real_uniformly_continuous_on f s --> real_continuous_on f s

content.name: real_uniformly_continuous_on_sequentially
prop: !x. !y. (!n. member (x n) s) & (!n. member (y n) s) &
tendsto_real (%n. x n - y n) 0 sequentially
--> tendsto_real (%n. f (x n) - f (y n)) 0 sequentially

content.name: real_uniformly_continuous_on_subset
prop: real_uniformly_continuous_on f s & subset t s

content.name: real_uniformly_continuous_on_const
content.prop: real_uniformly_continuous_on (%x. c) s

content.name: real_uniformly_continuous_on_id
content.prop: real_uniformly_continuous_on (%x. x) s

content.name: real_uniformly_continuous_on_add
prop: real_uniformly_continuous_on f s & real_uniformly_continuous_on g s
--> real_uniformly_continuous_on (%x. f x + g x) s

content.name: real_uniformly_continuous_on_sub
prop: real_uniformly_continuous_on f s & real_uniformly_continuous_on g s
--> real_uniformly_continuous_on (%x. f x - g x) s

content.name: real_uniformly_continuous_on_sum
prop: finite s & (!a. member a s --> real_uniformly_continuous_on (f a) t)
--> real_uniformly_continuous_on (%x. sum s (%a. f a x)) t

content.name: real_dini
prop: (!x. member x s --> tendsto_real (%n. f n x) (g x) sequentially) &
(!n. !x. member x s --> f n x <= f (n + 1) x)
--> eventually (%n. !x. member x s --> abs (f n x - g x) < e) sequentially

content.name: real_differentiable
content.prop: real_differentiable f net = ?f1. has_real_derivative f f1 net

content.name: real_derivative
content.prop: real_derivative f x = THE f1. has_real_derivative f f1 (atreal x)

content.name: real_differentiable_on
prop: !x. member x s --> ?f1. has_real_derivative f f1 (within (atreal x) s)

content.name: has_real_derivative_withinreal
prop: tendsto_real (%x. (f x - f a) / (x - a)) f1 (within (atreal a) s)

content.name: has_real_derivative_atreal
prop: tendsto_real (%x. (f x - f a) / (x - a)) f1 (atreal a)

content.name: real_differentiable_on_differentiable
prop: !x. member x s --> real_differentiable f (within (atreal x) s)

content.name: real_differentiable_on_real_open
prop: !x. member x s --> ?f1. has_real_derivative f f1 (atreal x)

content.name: real_differentiable_on_imp_differentiable_within
prop: real_differentiable_on f s & member x s

content.name: real_differentiable_on_imp_differentiable_atreal
prop: real_differentiable_on f s & real_open s & member x s

content.name: has_real_derivative_caratheodory_atreal
prop: ?g. (!b. f b - f a = g b * (b - a)) &
real_continuous g (atreal a) & g a = f1

content.name: has_real_derivative_caratheodory_withinreal
prop: ?g. (!b. f b - f a = g b * (b - a)) &
real_continuous g (within (atreal a) s) & g a = f1

content.name: real_differentiable_caratheodory_atreal
prop: ?g. (!b. f b - f a = g b * (b - a)) & real_continuous g (atreal a)

content.name: real_differentiable_caratheodory_withinreal
prop: ?g. (!b. f b - f a = g b * (b - a)) &

content.name: is_realinterval
prop: !a. !b. !c. member a s & member b s & a <= c & c <= b --> member c s

content.name: real_convex
prop: !x. !y. !u. !v. member x s & member y s & 0 <= u & 0 <= v & u + v = 1

content.name: real_convex_alt
prop: !x. !y. !u. member x s & member y s & 0 <= u & u <= 1
--> member ((1 - u) * x + u * y) s

content.name: real_midpoint_in_convex
content.prop: is_realinterval s & member x s & member y s --> member ((x + y) / 2) s

content.name: image_affinity_real_interval
prop: image (%x. m * x + c) (real_closed_interval a b) =

content.name: real_open_interval_translation
content.prop: real_open_interval (c + a) (c + b) = image (x. c + x) (real_open_interval a b)

content.name: real_differentiable_imp_continuous_atreal
content.prop: real_differentiable f (atreal x)  real_continuous f (atreal x)

content.name: has_real_derivative_imp_continuous_atreal
content.prop: has_real_derivative f f1 (atreal x)  real_continuous f (atreal x)

content.name: real_differentiable_on_imp_real_continuous_on
content.prop: real_differentiable_on f s  real_continuous_on f s

content.name: real_continuous_transform_withinreal_set_imp
prop: eventually (x. x  t --> x  s) (atreal a) &

content.name: has_real_derivative_within_subset
prop: has_real_derivative f f1 (within (atreal x) s) & subset t s

content.name: real_differentiable_within_subset
prop: real_differentiable f (within (atreal x) s)  t  s

content.name: has_real_derivative_transform_within
prop: (x1. x1  s  abs (x1 - x) < d  f x1 = g x1)

content.name: has_real_derivative_transform_atreal
prop: (x1. x1  s  abs (x1 - x) < d  f x1 = g x1)

content.name: has_real_derivative_zero_unique
prop: (x. x  s  has_real_derivative f 0 (within (atreal x) s))

content.name: real_diff_chain_within
prop: has_real_derivative g g1 (within (atreal (f x)) (image f s))

content.name: has_real_derivative_chain
prop: (!x. P x --> has_real_derivative g (g1 x) (atreal x))
-->(!x. !s. has_real_derivative f f1 (within (atreal x) s) & P (f x)
--> has_real_derivative (%x. g (f x)) (f1 * g1 (f x)) (within (atreal x) s)) & (!x. has_real_derivative f f1 (atreal x) & P (f x)

content.name: has_real_derivative_chain_univ
prop: (x. s. has_real_derivative f f1 (within (atreal x) s)
has_real_derivative (x. g (f x)) (f1 * g1 (f x)) (within (atreal x) s))
has_real_derivative (x. g (f x)) (f1 * g1 (f x)) (atreal x))

content.name: has_real_derivative_derivative
content.prop: has_real_derivative f f1 (atreal x)-->real_derivative f x = f1

content.name: has_real_derivative_lmul_within
prop: has_real_derivative (x. c * f x) (c * f1) (within (atreal x) s)

content.name: has_real_derivative_rmul_within
prop: has_real_derivative (x. f x * c) (f1 * c) (within (atreal x) s)

content.name: has_real_derivative_lmul_atreal
prop: has_real_derivative (x. c * f x) (c * f1) (atreal x)

content.name: has_real_derivative_rmul_atreal
prop: has_real_derivative (x. f x * c) (f1 * c) (atreal x)

content.name: has_real_derivative_cdiv_within
prop: has_real_derivative (x. f x / c) (f1 / c) (within (atreal x) s)

content.name: has_real_derivative_cdiv_atreal
prop: has_real_derivative (x. f x / c) (f1 / c) (atreal x)

content.name: has_real_derivative_id
content.prop: has_real_derivative (%x. x) 1 net

content.name: has_real_derivative_const
content.prop: has_real_derivative (x. c) 0 net

content.name: has_real_derivative_add
prop: has_real_derivative f f1 net & has_real_derivative g g1 net
has_real_derivative (x. f x + g x) (f1 + g1) net

content.name: has_real_derivative_sub
prop: has_real_derivative f f1 net  has_real_derivative g g1 net
has_real_derivative (x. f x - g x) (f1 - g1) net

content.name: has_real_derivative_mul_within
prop: has_real_derivative f f1 (within (atreal x) s)  has_real_derivative g g1 (within (atreal x) s)
has_real_derivative (x. f x * g x) (f x * g1 + f1 * g x) (within (atreal x) s)

content.name: has_real_derivative_mul_atreal
prop: has_real_derivative (x. f x * g x) (f x * g1 + f1 * g x) (atreal x)

content.name: has_real_derivative_pow_within
prop: has_real_derivative (x. f x ^ n) (real_of_nat n * f x ^ (n - 1) * f1)

content.name: has_real_derivative_pow_atreal
prop: has_real_derivative (x. f x ^ n) (real_of_nat n * f x ^ (n - 1) * f1)

content.name: has_real_derivative_inv_within
prop: has_real_derivative f f1 (within (atreal x) s) & x = 0

content.name: has_real_derivative_div_within
prop: has_real_derivative g g1 (within (atreal x) s)  g x = 0
has_real_derivative (x. f x / g x) ((f1 * g x - f x * g1) / g x ^ 2) (within (atreal x) s)

content.name: has_real_derivative_div_atreal
prop: has_real_derivative g g1 (atreal x)  g x = 0
has_real_derivative (x. f x / g x) ((f1 * g x - f x * g1) / g x ^ 2)

content.name: has_real_derivative_sum
prop: finite s & (!a. a  s --> has_real_derivative (f a) (f1 a) net)
--> has_real_derivative (%x. sum s (%a. f a x)) (sum s f1) net

content.name: real_differentiable_const
content.prop: real_differentiable (x. c) net

content.name: real_differentiable_id
content.prop: real_differentiable (x. x) net

content.name: real_differentiable_neg
content.prop: real_differentiable f net  real_differentiable (x. -f x) net

content.name: real_differentiable_add
prop: real_differentiable f net & real_differentiable g net
real_differentiable (x. f x + g x) net

content.name: real_differentiable_sub
prop: real_differentiable f net  real_differentiable g net
real_differentiable (x. f x - g x) net

content.name: real_differentiable_mul_within
prop: real_differentiable f (within (atreal x) s)  real_differentiable g (within (atreal x) s)
real_differentiable (x. f x * g x) (within (atreal x) s)

content.name: real_differentiable_mul_atreal
prop: real_differentiable (x. f x * g x) (atreal x)

content.name: real_differentiable_transform_within
prop: (!x1. member x1 s & abs (x1 - x) < d --> f x1 = g x1) &

content.name: real_differentiable_div_within
prop: real_differentiable g (within (atreal x) s)  g x = 0
real_differentiable (x. f x / g x) (within (atreal x) s)
